items.title: RaW Ep8: Conditions
items.dc:creator: JT & Toby
items.content:
This week we go through the various conditions of D&D and where to expect from them!

Check us out on:

items.title: RaW Ep7: Rests
items.dc:creator: JT & Toby
items.content:

items.creator: JT & Toby
items.title: RaW Ep5: Time and Space
items.dc:creator: JT & Toby
items.content:
This week we go through how time and distances work in D&D. How far can you travel in a day? How does terrain affect your travel? How long is a minute? All these questions and more are answered within!

Check us out on:

https://rulesaswrittenshow.com/

Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCpqh72Jl2K09HvKBiqMixAA

Contact us at:

Toby@rulesaswrittenshow.com

--- Send in a voice message: https://anchor.fm/rules-as-written/message Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/rules-as-written/support

image.title: Rules As Written: A D&D Podcast

creator: JT & Toby
title: Rules As Written: A D&D Podcast
description: Here we talk about the rules in the Dungeons and Dragons Player's Handbook and as many 5E expansions we can afford to help you level up your player game. Learn more about us and sign up to the newsletter to get the latest episodes at https://rulesaswrittenshow.com New episodes weekly! Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/rules-as-written/support
author: JT & Toby
